statements: DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_id = 1 AND capacity_in_tons > 1000
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_name LIKE 'ABC%'
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_id = 1 AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_name = 'Landfill A';
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_name = 'City Landfill';
DELETE FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_id = 1 AND capacity < 1000
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_statistics WHERE disposal_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount = 0
DELETE FROM landfill_location WHERE latitude < 40 OR longitude > -100
DELETE FROM landfill_statistics WHERE site_id = 1 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM decision_making_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM decision_making_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Approved')
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM landfill_sites WHERE location = 'New York')
